titleStmt.title: The fairy Queene. Her invitation to those elves, that in the night doe sport themselves, of them a just character here, decipher'd is as't shall appeare. To the tune of, The Spanish gypsies.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
In two parts, printed side by side.
At head of second part: Being the pastimes and other slights, of will-with-a-wispe, and other mad sprights.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
